timeline.title: Drag_drop_swipe
timeline.description: Developed an open-source Node.js module enabling dependency-free drag, drop, and swipe interactions, compatible with both Node.js and vanilla HTML projects.

timeline.title: MoodyAiBot
timeline.description: Designed an Angular-based AI chatbot, integrating the Gemini API to generate multi-modal responses and improve conversational flow and user engagement

timeline.title: University Time-table generator
timeline.description: Automated the scheduling process for a university time-table generator, solving over 100 constraints across departments and labs. This reduced manual effort by 90% and saved over 100 hours of administrative work per semester using Backtracking, Genetic Algorithms, and OR- Tools

timeline.title: HOSPITAL-MANAGEMENT-SYSTEM
timeline.description: Built a comprehensive no-code hospital management system using Bubble.io, which streamlined patient registration, appointment scheduling, and record management, reducing administrative time by an estimated 30%.

timeline.title: Elcostra
timeline.description: Developed and enhanced a web-based JSON viewer for an open-source project, improving data visualization for developers.

timeline.title: ForkTheCaptcha
timeline.description: Contributed to the ForkTheCaptcha open-source project, developing algorithms to generate robust captcha models from synthetic fonts. This improved the security of the project and reduced bot attack success rates by an estimated 40%.

timeline.title: UiPath Smart Automation
timeline.description: Completed one month of training on automation using UiPath

timeline.title: Web Developer
timeline.description: Created the company website and developed a drag-and-drop mechanism for customizing name plates, allowing users to personalize their designs interactively.

timeline.title: AI consultant
timeline.description: Helped the team with setting up pipelines and guided interns on how to work with machine learning models.

timeline.title: Web Development Intern
timeline.description: Developed and maintained the company's website, ensuring a smooth and responsive user experience. Provided UX recommendations to enhance usability and engagement. Collaborated with the team to improve site performance and functionality.

timeline.title: AI-ML Internship
timeline.description: Completed an AI-ML Internship at AICTE EduSkill, where I worked on artificial intelligence and machine learning projects. Developed skills in Python, data analysis, and model training. Built and evaluated machine learning models, participated in collaborative projects, and gained hands-on experience with real-world datasets.

timeline.title: Smart India Hackathon 2023
timeline.description: Participated in the Smart India Hackathon 2023, where I worked on a web application project involving web scraping and research work. Learned web scraping techniques from my teacher, which proved extremely helpful in gathering and processing data for the project. This experience enhanced my practical skills and deepened my understanding of web technologies.
